articles.title: Scientists find ‘lost world’ in billion-year-old Australian rock - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Study says discovery of microscopic creatures could be the ‘oldest remnants’ of human lineage.
articles.content:
Scientists have discovered a lost world of ancient organisms in billion-year-old rocks from northern Australia that they say could change the worlds understanding of humans earliest ancestors.
